law.catch_line: Authority vested in department may be executed by employees of department.
law.text: All authority vested in the department by virtue of the provisions of KRS 217.542 to 217.630 may, with like force and effect, be executed by employees of the department.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 60, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 14. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 218, sec. 11, effective July 1, 1956.
